text: Beussent is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A small village situated some 7 miles(11 km) north of Montreuil-sur-Mer, on the D127 road. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Beussent
